snippet.title: MLB The Show 25 - Gameplay Trailer | PS5 Games
snippet.description:
Pre-order at https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/mlb-the-show/ 

The game has evolved. Forge a new journey. 

New ways to compete and control your game in ‘25: 

Road to The Show: The Amateur Years
Road to The Show: Path to 99 Progression
Franchise: Front Office Experience
Diamond Dynasty: Diamond Quest*
Diamond Dynasty: Weekend Classic*
Introducing ShowTech™

Early Access begins March 14, 2025
Available March 18, 2025

*Internet connection required

#ps5 #ps5games #mlbtheshow25
